tasks.title: Setup Project Repository
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository with the necessary structure and configurations for FlowPilot.
tasks.details: Create a Git repository and set up the basic folder structure for frontend (Next.js) and backend (Edge Functions). Include a README file with project overview and setup instructions.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure the repository is accessible and properly structured by cloning it and verifying the folder hierarchy.

tasks.title: Implement Authentication System
tasks.description: Set up user authentication using Supabase for Google and Microsoft OAuth.
tasks.details: Integrate Supabase for user authentication, configure OAuth scopes, and handle user sessions. Create endpoints for login and token management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the authentication flow by logging in with both Google and Microsoft accounts, ensuring tokens are correctly issued and stored.

subtasks.title: Integrate Google OAuth
subtasks.description: Set up Google OAuth integration for user authentication.
subtasks.details: Configure the Supabase project to enable Google OAuth, including setting up the necessary credentials and redirect URIs.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the Google login flow to ensure users can authenticate and receive valid tokens.

subtasks.title: Integrate Microsoft OAuth
subtasks.description: Set up Microsoft OAuth integration for user authentication.
subtasks.details: Configure the Supabase project to enable Microsoft OAuth, including setting up the necessary credentials and redirect URIs.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the Microsoft login flow to ensure users can authenticate and receive valid tokens.

subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that user sessions persist correctly and expire as expected after a set duration.

subtasks.title: Create Authentication Endpoints
subtasks.description: Develop endpoints for login and token management.
subtasks.details: Implement API endpoints for user login, token issuance, and token refresh functionalities.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the endpoints to ensure they respond correctly to login requests and manage tokens properly.

subtasks.title: Error Handling and Validation
subtasks.description: Implement error handling and input validation for the authentication process.
subtasks.details: Ensure that all authentication processes include proper error handling and user feedback for invalid inputs or failed logins.
subtasks.testStrategy: Simulate various error scenarios to verify that appropriate error messages are returned to the user.

tasks.title: Integrate Google Calendar API
tasks.description: Connect the application with Google Calendar to import events and detect free time.
tasks.details: Use OAuth scopes for `calendar.readonly` to access user calendars. Implement event detection logic to identify free time slots.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify calendar integration by fetching events and checking for free time slots, ensuring the data is displayed correctly in the application.

tasks.title: Implement Task Ingestion Feature
tasks.description: Allow users to input tasks via text or voice using OpenAI's Whisper for transcription.
tasks.details: Integrate OpenAI's Whisper API for voice-to-text functionality and create a structured task model to capture user input.
tasks.testStrategy: Test task ingestion by inputting tasks both via text and voice, ensuring they are correctly structured and stored in the database.

tasks.title: Develop Task Prioritization Engine
tasks.description: Create an engine to prioritize tasks based on user-defined archetypes and LLM inference.
tasks.details: Implement logic to categorize tasks into archetypes (urgent, deep work, etc.) and utilize LLM for automatic prioritization when user input is absent.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate the prioritization engine by inputting various tasks and checking if they are categorized and prioritized correctly.

tasks.title: Build Daily Planner UI
tasks.description: Design and implement a daily planner interface that displays tasks in time blocks.
tasks.details: Use Next.js and Tailwind CSS to create a clean UI for the daily planner, integrating calendar events and AI-generated tasks.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct usability testing to ensure the planner is intuitive and displays tasks accurately, including time blocks and priorities.

tasks.title: Implement Adaptive Rescheduling Logic
tasks.description: Create a system to automatically reschedule missed tasks based on user behavior.
tasks.details: Develop a task retry queue that adjusts task priorities based on completion patterns and user behavior.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate missed tasks and verify that they are rescheduled correctly, with appropriate priority adjustments reflected in the planner.

tasks.title: Create Chat Interface
tasks.description: Develop a chat interface that allows users to interact with the planner using natural language queries.
tasks.details: Integrate OpenAI's function calling capabilities to handle user queries and provide contextual responses based on task data.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the chat interface with various queries to ensure it responds accurately and contextually to user requests.

tasks.title: Implement Analytics Dashboard
tasks.description: Build a dashboard to visualize task completion rates, skipped tasks, and productivity insights.
tasks.details: Create visual representations of user data using charts and graphs, leveraging local or server-side analytics.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate the analytics dashboard by comparing displayed data against raw task logs to ensure accuracy in visualizations.

tasks.title: Enable Offline Mode Functionality
tasks.description: Implement offline support for task viewing and completion using IndexedDB/local storage.
tasks.details: Utilize IndexedDB to store tasks locally and sync changes when the user reconnects to the internet.
tasks.testStrategy: Test offline functionality by disconnecting from the internet, completing tasks, and verifying that changes sync correctly upon reconnection.
